website_summaries.verdict: A valued-priced option that doesn't lack quality, and an excellent deal.
pros: A basic design with a reliable, textured grip
cons: Some owners say the rubber construction doesn't feel completely sturdy

customer_reviews.title: Great Exercise Tool!
customer_reviews.text: I'd worked with these balls in the gym in the past and like them. I like the Valeo because they're easy to grip even if your hands get sweaty during the workout. It arrived promptly and completely inflated, so no problems there. It also comes with a booklet with some exercises in it, which I find helpful and a nice change to my routine. If you don't have one of these I recommend it for, if nothing else, a change to your exercise routine and, with this ball, you can work a lot of different areas.
customer_reviews.author: ladylawdawg

customer_reviews.title: Just as described....would purchase again
customer_reviews.text: I love these balls...they have enough bounce, but not too much. Love the durable outer...you can beat it against a brick wall or a cement pad and it comes back for more. Plus the textured ball adds a little help as you try and catch it... So why I said I would by again, I"m not sure I will ever have to...this thing looks like it will last forever!
customer_reviews.author: J. ReedTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this medicine ball and the way it feels. The texture is amazing and is certain not to slip out of your hands. I also love to use it with my JumpSport Rebounder. It is the perfect size and weight. I hope the smell fades a little... it is a bit strong. Love this brand, Valeo!!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie H - Florida

customer_reviews.title: A Quality Sturdy Product
customer_reviews.text: With all the choices around I was afraid to order this online, but in the end I was happy with the purchase. It is a quality product that even holds up to my level of abuse.
customer_reviews.author: Milamber

customer_reviews.title: Watch out for the smell.
customer_reviews.text: Quality seems good, but these balls have a VERY strong rubber smell. Two balls stink up my room. I'm hoping it fades with time.
customer_reviews.author: A. Yu

customer_reviews.title: Solid Product.
customer_reviews.text: It's a medicine ball. Round. Heavy. It works for the general exercising that I do; have not tested it slamming/throwing. I only purchased the 12lb which is around the size of a basketball, but would purchase other weights of this product if needed.
customer_reviews.author: BreeInVT

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for What I Needed
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Valeo 12 pound medicine ball for basketball related workouts. It's about the same size as a basketball and has a good feel. I'm very happy with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: NH Guy

customer_reviews.title: Ball split after one use
customer_reviews.text: 4lb ball split after one use and needed to be returned - replacing with a different brand
customer_reviews.author: Hugh I.

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: great product good choice I would rec for anybody to buy this product. packaged well good condition easy to use
customer_reviews.author: soltan

customer_reviews.title: Does the job, but smelled so bad!
customer_reviews.text: Okay, a medicine ball is a medicine ball, thats what this is. But the rubber smell took weeks to go away and it was very very strong, made me feel sick. Can't they get rid of the smell before they ship it? right now its sitting in the furnace room and I'm stilling waiting for that strong odor to go.
customer_reviews.author: moman

customer_reviews.title: Ruptured after 4 hours of use.
customer_reviews.text: I used this medicine ball for about 4 hours, and it ruptured. I primarily used it to do overhead power slams onto my driveway. The ball made a loud hissing sound and a 4" gash was in its side. A fatal rupture.
customer_reviews.author: James Marsh

customer_reviews.title: Sweet medicine ball
customer_reviews.text: It's well made and it is basically a slightly smaller basketball that weighs 10 LBS. It seems durable and has a nice surface to grip and retains it's shape (also bounces). I use to sell Valeo products at GNC and the quality was usually acceptable and the price was usually reasonable (except at GNC). There are only 2 drawbacks I can see, one it's a bit bigger than I would like and two you find out after the purchase they recommend you buy a basketball pump. It slowly deflates like a basketball and I was hoping it was maintenance free!
customer_reviews.author: James F. Rendek

customer_reviews.title: 12 pound ball is great
customer_reviews.text: I had a personal trainer and we did so many workouts with the ball that I decided to buy my own as the exercises can be done at home. The 12 pd ball is about the same size as a basketball and had a good grip to it which ensures you will hold onto it when you are doing chopping exersises. If you are doing the squat jump up and slam the ball down you will get the ball to bounce about waist high. If you are using the ball to do chest exersises by phusing / throwing ball to the wall you will get about a two foot bounce back.
customer_reviews.author: W. Dietrich

customer_reviews.title: Balls are already cracking - cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: It's taken less than 60 days and 2 of these medicine balls are already cracked from normal everyday usage. I would not recommend this product for any type of commercial usage, or bouncing of the ball. Oh well, back to the drawing board, AGAIN.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald

customer_reviews.title: So happy I included this in my workout regime
customer_reviews.text: First of all I would like to say that this medicine ball is very easy to grip and an excellent size. I had purchased this to use at home, as I try to workout every single morning before I begin my day. I do all sorts of squats, ab exercises, etc. using this medicine ball. It actually reminds very much of the medicine balls that are found in gyms across this city. Professional grade. This medicine ball also comes with a very helpful poster that tells you exactly all sorts of different exercises that you can do with it. I have been using it with P90X for a little bit and the results have been phenomenal!
customer_reviews.author: Vernonman

customer_reviews.title: good medicine ball, indoors especially
customer_reviews.text: I've just started getting into using a medicine ball. I had one old one that caked out on me. I got this Valeo and it's great and has withheld fairly heavy usage well. I'm not thrilled about how it rubs outside so use it only indoors or on mats outside if you want to protect the outer skin covering.
customer_reviews.author: G. White

customer_reviews.title: Complete junk!!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Ball split under normal use, bought a 4 lb and a 12 lb and both broke. Very disappointed. DO NOT BUY!!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Slota

customer_reviews.title: Favorite ab enhancer
customer_reviews.text: I really like the medball to reinforce an ab workout either solo or with a partner. Valeo is also a brand I recognize and trust.
customer_reviews.author: I'm Wise

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great item, very durable. best medicine ball on the market. Great and fast service. Will last a lifetime of abuse.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

product_meta.title: Valeo Medicine Ball with Sturdy Rubber Construction and Textured Finish, Weight Ball Includes Exercise Wall Chart for Strength Training, Plyometric Training, Balance Training and Muscle Build
product_meta.description:
Valeo's 4 pound medicine ball features sturdy rubber construction with a textured surface for superior grip. The durable construction allows the ball to bounce off hard surfaces. The ball includes an exercise wall chart. Helps develop core strength and improve coordination, balance, and endurance.

AMAZON.COM
The classic, heart-pumping challenge of a medicine ball workout has endured for years for one simple reason -- it's incredibly effective. Develop core strength, improve coordination, and fine-tune your balance with these simple, durable models from Valeo. Sturdy rubber construction with a textured finish can bounce off of hard surfaces and provides a solid grip. The balls come in four-, six-, eight-, ten-, and 12-pound weights, and a handy exercise wall chart is also included. 

 About Valeo Fitness
Since the introduction of the original Classic Belt in 1988, Valeo continues to develop products of uncompromising quality and value. Valeo has an extensive line of fitness accessories including lifting gloves, body balls, jump ropes, and more. Every Valeo fitness product can be used at home or at the gym, and many are easy to take along when you are on the road.
feature_bullets: Classic medicine ball workout helps develop core strength, improve coordination, and fine-tune balance
Sturdy rubber construction can bounce off hard surfaces
Textured finish provides a solid grip
Come in four-, six-, eight-, ten-, and 12-pound weights
Exercise wall chart is also included
